changes.title: New UI for output beam stabilization

releases.title: Fix stable output power target with GDD changes

changes.title: Fix stable output power target changes when changing compressor GDD glass
Simplify wavelength setter parameters
changes.details: Number of independent parameters has been decreased, some parameters can be measured if device is able to set output.

changes.title: Delay line motors are moved around during periodic device optimization
changes.details: Delay line motors are moved during every device optimization (every night by default) to avoid possible mechanical problems

changes.title: UI improvements
changes.details: UI improvements for periodic device optimization and wavelength setter parameters

changes.title: Support switch motor calibration via separation instead of optical curves
changes.details: Calibration curve can be migrated via WinTopas4 'Simplify' and 'To Separation' buttons in motor calibration curve view. Cronus sanity checker has been modified to ignore lack of switch curves in SIG1/2 interactions.

changes.title: spectraLight can connect to internal spectrometers while Cronus app is running

releases.title: VIS2 wavelength setting tweaks, log Temperature 4

changes.title: Change some algorithm parameters for VIS2 wavelength setting
Adjustment mode works correctly with stable output power targets
Delay offset was never applied
changes.details: Hotfix for 0.80.0 - delay offset was never applied when setting output

changes.title: Add stable output power targets
changes.details: Output power for tunable channels is always adjusted to the same wavelength-depending value when setting output (if enabled and configured).

changes.title: Calibrate internal power meter tool can't connect to external power meter

releases.title: Output setting rewrite, Fast Tuning Mode

changes.title: Output setting rewrite
changes.details: Output setting algorithm was rewritten for faster and more resilient output setting with self-learning capabilities.

changes.title: Fast Tuning Mode
changes.details: Users can use Fast Tuning Mode instead of traditional way to set the output to achieve super-quick change of output wavelength. Fast Tuning Mode has to be prepared prior use (takes about 8 minutes) and updated every few days. Tuning speed is limited by compressor motor movement speed in most cases.

changes.title: Channel 1 long wavelength range impovments
changes.details: New wavelength search algorithm allows to set wavelength in 800-970 nm range for Channel 1 with the same precision as in other output ranges.

releases.title: API docs refresh and demo devices

changes.title: API docs refresh and demo devices
changes.details:
- Built in REST API has been refreshed for better looks
-  REST API online docs published at https://topas4api.lightcon.com/current/Cronus.html
- Special installation package for demo device is available (see REST API page)

changes.title: Topas4Server is always started on Cronus startup
Improve GDD preset curves UI
changes.details:
* User can now select existing curves from dropdown
* Create new curves
* Remove specific points from existing curve

changes.title: Add GDD preset curves
changes.details: User can save currently set wavelength-GDD pair to the calibration curve. This curve later can be used to select GDD when setting any new wavelength in user-calibrated range.  Curves are saved together with Topas4 calibration using GDDPRESET X naming scheme.

changes.title: Support for per-shutter LEDs
changes.details:
All three shutters are connected to different motor boards, SH1 socket.
Main.json : "ShuttersSource": "EthMotorBoards_V1"

changes.title: Include channel user preferences in state dump

releases.title: Enable automatic updates for beta releases

changes.title: Automatic updates for beta releases
changes.details: Application is updated automatically inside Light Conversion. If update is available when application is starting, it is downloaded and applied immediately.

releases.title: Add tool to dump device state to json file

changes.title: Add adjustment mode calibration tool
changes.details: Power delivery motor positions can be calibrated as wavelength functions from target power levels in the Configuration\ChX\ AdjustmentModePower.dat file. File should contain columns of wavelength in nm and power in mW.

changes.title: Expose internal power meters for PowerScanner
changes.details: PowerScanner can now use internal power meters. User has to select correct meter manually by serial nubmer.

changes.title: Update logs system
changes.details:
+ Device performance logs can be synced on request at any time
+ New model for logs syncing authorization

releases.title: Fix testing procedure for control COM port

changes.title: Fix testing procedure for control COM port
changes.details: Timeout increased to 25 seconds

releases.title: Power modes overhaul, internal diodes calibration

changes.title: Various changes regarding 'Full Power', 'Adjustment Mode', and 'Standby' states
changes.details:
+ Add 'Enter Standby Mode' button to service window
+ Wavelength stabilization is turned off when entering 'Standby'
+ Set output again when leaving standby mode
+ Other fixes to power modes handling

changes.title: Add internal power meter calibration via external power meter
changes.details: 'Power Calibration tool' in service window allows to calibrate internal power meters by wavelength if external power meter is connected

changes.title: Wavelength setting might fail in rare cases while optimizing power in any stage
Delete huge tracelog files on app startup
Add cherry-picked info to the top of device dump file

releases.title: Add tool to dump device state to json file

changes.title: Add tool to dump device state to json file.
changes.details: Saved information includes current device state, parts of configuration and other system information. Accessible via 'Dump state to file' button in service window, tools tab. Dump files are saved to C:\Programs\Cronus\StateDumps

changes.title: Change default value for ShutterWatcherToZero in Main.json
changes.details: Onward from this version default value for this option is **true**. If this option is omitted from Main.json configuration file, system will go to standby state (instead of adjustment mode) after shutters are closed for ShutterWatcherTimeoutSeconds.

changes.title: Target .NET 4.7.2 framework
changes.details: Targeted .NET framework version changes from 4.6.2 to 4.7.2. Some users might need to install a new version of .NET runtime on their PCs to launch application.

changes.title: Fix warmup timer display.
changes.details: Warmup timer now correctly goes down from 01:30:00 to 00:00:00 instead of starting again after 30 minutes

changes.title: Extend API to allow set output with specific GDD filter wheel position.

releases.title: Add support for different pump oscillator

changes.title: Different oscillator support.
changes.details:
Oscillators that start mode locking at pump currents where CW is already present are supported. This option must be set in Main.json to be active 

 ` "OscillatorType": "CWonML" `

changes.title: Output presets
changes.details: You can save your favorite wavelength and GDD combinations and quickly apply them.

changes.title: Fast tuning option for small GDD changes
changes.details: Select this option if you want to quickly tune GDD while keeping the same wavelength. Beam centering will be intelligently  skipped when possible.

changes.title: Extend REST and Com port API
changes.details:
API now has PUTOutput method which can be used to set required wavelength and GDD in single call. 

 ` PUT /Output {"Wavelength":891.2, "GDD":-12000} ` 

 [API Docs](https://gist.github.com/DomasM/2f802a24d4a354b020b66f2d89267003)

changes.title: Add Emission Warning
changes.details: Emission Warning in orange box is always displayed in main window when current is supplied to pump bars.
